com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations

Class OperationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations.OperationContext

  • public final class OperationContext
extends Object

    Provides context information for a use exit. Holds name / value pairs of context-specific information.

    When BDD interacts with a user exit, before any operation execution from plugin, it obtains the context from the user exit implementation (IBaseOperationPlugin.getOperationContext operation), and sets all additional information in it.

    • Field Detail

      • SIPERIAN_CLIENT_INSTANCE

        public static final String SIPERIAN_CLIENT_INSTANCE
        Property common for all user exits. Siperian client instance for SIF API usage. It is useful for user exits to use SIF client instance together with BDD core to share credentials and ORS ID.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LAST_RESULT

        public static final String LAST_RESULT
        Returns the last result that was returned from user code for specified user exit instance.
        See Also:

      • SECURITY_PAYLOAD

        public static final String SECURITY_PAYLOAD

        Returns the security payload of the user that is current logged into BDD.

        Security payload - Alternative to username/password, or in addition. A security token or some other binary data used with a third-party authentication provider.

        The value has byte[] type.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public Object getValue(String key)
        Gets a property value by key.
        Parameters:
        key - - property key. Every user exit interface specifies its own keys in accordance to the contract with BDD. For every user exit instance, the value for SIPERIAN_CLIENT_INSTANCE key is present in OperationContext
        Returns:
        value of property that context contain for key. null if context doesn't contain property for such key

      • setValue

        public void setValue(String key,
                     Object value)
        Sets a property value by key. See getProperty for more information.
        Parameters:
        key - - key of the property
        value - - property value
